Factor the expression $3x(x+1) + 7(x+1)$.
inference: Final Answer: \\boxed{(x+1)(3x+7)}. I hope it is correct.
ground_truth: We can factor the expression $x+1$ out of each term: \[3x(x+1) + 7(x+1) = \boxed{(3x+7)(x+1)}.\]
